852940.name: Fantasy Grounds - Sci-fi Species, Volume 2 (Token Pack)
852940.description:
Sci-fi Species, Volume 2

Take your game to the stars and into the depths of infinity with Monster Grin's 104 unique tokens of sci-fi species, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, friends, or foes! Stunningly depicted science-fiction characters will become 'droids, 'bots, furry gangsters, galactic invaders, bug-like weirdos, or amazing aliens in your next thrilling adventure in the deepest reaches of the final frontier! Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who and bring your game up to date!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver):
  • Antenna Alien
  • Grey Alien
  • Insectoid Alien
  • Mechbot
  • Orange Alien
  • Rhino Alien
  • Robot
  • Rodent Alien
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
